Since we already have sandbox and Career and Science mode, I think we should have in-game options to enable/disable some of those features in a sandbox save.

Examples:

- Enable/Disable science

- Enable/Disable currency

- Enable/Disable tech tree.

Things of the like.

I've said it before and I'll say it again. There is no reason for science reports not to be available on Sandbox. If you're gonna give us the instruments and let us access the menu, at least give us something else than the "this is useless without R&D" messages.

C'mon SQUAD, it was probably harder to write the new message than it would be to enable the real ones.

As before, I agree entirely, but also as before: you can do this now (albeit not as easily as it could be).
